features: TRIAXIAL SPEAKER SYSTEMS: The woofer feature an eye-catching blue poly injection cone for plenty of stiffness without added weight The 1-inch ASV voice coil is ready for high-temperature, high-wattage situations
LOW IMPEDANCE: Pyle 4 ohm component audio speaker compensates the undersized wire found in many of today’s cars It also make the most of every 240 watt your car stereo can deliver

MIDRANGE TWEETER: Pyle Pro three way sound speaker system has one-inch neodymium film dome midrange and 3/4-inch piezo tweeter that complete the package It helps to provide smooth, loud and detailed sound in each pair

DEFINITE STRUCTURE: The 20 oz magnet structure, 1” neodymium film dome midrange, and ¾” piezo tweeter are what power these speakers and allow for a 95Hz - 20Khz frequency response Also, it features standard 4'' X 6'' size fits OEM locations

POWERFUL FEATURES: The non-fatiguing butyl rubber surround keeps your speakers secure and extending the life of the product A 1” high-temperature ASV voice coil provides the richest sound, ensuring low distortion and providing an open sound stage
body.description: Pyle's Blue Label series speakers don't just sound great - they look great, too. Feast your eyes upon the azure curves of Pyle's Blue Label series and you'll agree. They're great replacements for your vehicle's factory speakers - you'll hear the difference immediately. Included in this package is a pair of 4' x 6' three-way 240 watt speakers - carrying the high, mid, and low end for a fuller range sound. The non-fatiguing butyl rubber surround keeps your speakers secure as well as extending the life of the product. A 1' high-temperature ASV voice coil provides the richest sound, ensuring low distortion and providing an open sound stage. The blue poly injection cone looks great and allows your music to resonate with full power. The 20 oz. magnet structure, 1' neodymium film dome midrange, and ¾' piezo tweeter are what power these speakers and allow for a 95 Hz - 20 kHz frequency response. Includes grills, wires, and mounting hardware. Trust Pyle to provide quality sound at a competitive price. Features:One Pair 4'' x 6'' Three-Way Triaxial Speaker Systems Power Handling: 120 Watts Rms / 240 Watts Max Non-fatiguing Butyl Rubber Surround 1'' High Temperature ASV Voice Coil Standard 4'' X 6'' Size Fits Oem LocationsBlue Poly Injection Cone20 Oz Magnet Structure1'' Neodymium Film Dome Midrange3/4'' Piezo TweeterImpedance: 4 OhmSensitivity: 89 dBFrequency Response: 95Hz - 20KhzIncludes Grills, Wires And Mounting HardwareMounting Depth: 1.75''Sold as: PairWeight: 3.58 lbs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: People leaving bad reviews don’t know audio. These are good speakers, unless you have a after market amp. The distortion is coming from You’re radio not having the power to push them. At the rated max wats from my amp they sounded crisp. You’re 200W radio is the issue, not the speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The speakers are clear and play well. More importantly they were the perfect replacement/fit for the speakers in my old truck. 1988-1994 chevy C-1500. These speakers will fit for both the front & back speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great 🔊 hooked up to Pioneer 50 watt per channel! 1 blew bass after 2.5 yrs, they are rated more than that? Thought they would last longer than that! I guess they want you to keep spending $$$ all time ,nothing like stuff made to last anymore! Got same brand on front door but they Yellow round they still holding up! For now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These speakers are good value for the money!
reviews.reviewText: Nice speakers to replace stock speakers in your vehicle for the money. I don't think you will find a better value for what you spend on these products! Pyle makes reasonably priced products that are definitely an upgrade from most stock products in cars today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bad fit. Magnet oversized. Sounds like tin. Unnecessary sized pos and neg tabs. Materials junk. Looks cool though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great extra speakers, good for shallow installations
reviews.reviewText: I consider these to be “compliment speakers”. If you already established a proper upgrade (head unit, factory speakers, sub and amp) then these are an amazing addition to your system. I would not recommend them as stand alone replacement for factory. The highs are crisp and clean and good mid range (not great). Sort of a hybrid tweeter. Lows are almost non existent but with subs it doesn’t really matter. Have these connected to a Sony amp pushing 60 rms and no distortion or cracking. I been messing with systems for 30+ years and can say they are worth it. Note: the pic is from a 06 Jeep Laredo above the backseat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sounds great in my car
reviews.reviewText: It was abhreat sounding speaker system easy to install

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No deep bass
reviews.reviewText: Used in my Chevy spark . Multiple holes made easy to install. Sound quality is good but no deep bass. Distorts if have bass up but has 100 times better sound than factory

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Had these previously so knew they were good and really happy with them this time again.
belle a vedersi e dal suono ottimo

Están muy bien terminados. No es un sonido de escándalo pero están bastante bien. Embalaje muy bueno, perfectamente protegidos.La única pega es que el cableado (que ya viene listo para enchufar además con suficientes metros) es demasiado fino. Válido pero muy fino
